references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models, which significantly reduced computational demands in image synthesis, making it a foundational work for high-resolution image generation.

references.paper_title: Flow straight and fast: Learning to generate and transfer data with rectified flow
references.reason: This paper introduces Rectified Flow which streamlines the formulation of ODE models.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper is fundamental for text-to-image generation as it explains how to train transferable models with visual data.
This paper is a fundamental one as it presents denoising diffusion probabilistic models.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper explains how to add conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models, highlighting its potential in facilitating personalized high-resolution image generation.
